item.title: Will the Rams D’ help muddy the Browns’ QB situation this weekend? Marc Lillibridge thinks so
item.itunes:author: 101 ESPN
item.itunes:summary: Marc Lillibridge joined Kevin Wheeler show to talk about Johnny Manziel and the bird flip, the competition in Cleveland, how the Rams will help muddy those waters, the players who need to perform in week 3 of the preseason, and the injuries in the NFC West taking effect on the division.
item.description: Marc Lillibridge joined Kevin Wheeler show to talk about Johnny Manziel and the bird flip, the competition in Cleveland, how the Rams will help muddy those waters, the players who need to perform in week 3 of the preseason, and the injuries in the NFC West taking effect on the division.

item.title: Have “the tables been tilted a bit” for the Rams with the recent turmoil in the NFC West? Eric Edholm
item.itunes:author: 101 ESPN
item.itunes:summary: Eric Edholm joined the Kevin Wheeler show to talk about all the penalties in the Preseason, Johnny Manziel and the circus surrounding him, the NFC West injuries, how it affect the Rams, the coaching staff affect on the Rams, and where this division stands.
item.description: Eric Edholm joined the Kevin Wheeler show to talk about all the penalties in the Preseason, Johnny Manziel and the circus surrounding him, the NFC West injuries, how it affect the Rams, the coaching staff affect on the Rams, and where this division stands.

item.title: Why is the closer decision “one (Matheny) doesn’t want to have to make?” Bernie Miklasz expounds
item.itunes:author: 101 ESPN
item.itunes:summary: Bernie Miklasz joined Kevin Wheeler to talk about the closing situation, the other options, this team’s continued questions, the Rams heading into week 3 of the preseason, and what might happen if Manziel, Michael Sam, Kevin Love, and LeBron James are all in the same stadium at the same time.
item.description: Bernie Miklasz joined Kevin Wheeler to talk about the closing situation, the other options, this team’s continued questions, the Rams heading into week 3 of the preseason, and what might happen if Manziel, Michael Sam, Kevin Love, and LeBron James are all in the same stadium at the same time.

item.title: Are the Cards catching the Reds at the right time? Lance McAlister answers
item.itunes:author: 101 ESPN
item.itunes:summary: Lance McAlister on ESPN Cincy joined Kevin Wheeler to talk about the disastrous baseball the Reds are playing, all the injuries, the inconsistency of the pitching staff, the conundrum the Reds have ahead with four of the five starting pitchers set for free agency in 2015, is it time to retool, and who is the hot player to watch in this series.
item.description: Lance McAlister on ESPN Cincy joined Kevin Wheeler to talk about the disastrous baseball the Reds are playing, all the injuries, the inconsistency of the pitching staff, the conundrum the Reds have ahead with four of the five starting pitchers set for free agency in 2015, is it time to retool, and who is the hot player to watch in this series.

item.title: John Anderson on his time with Mizzou’s Maty Mauk: “He is not afraid, he doesn’t lack confidence”
item.itunes:author: 101 ESPN
item.itunes:summary: ESPN’s John Anderson joined “The Kevin Wheeler Show” to talk about the SEC Network, spending time with Mizzou, the Tigers producing defensive lineman and QBs, Maty Mauk, the competition in the SEC, and his take on the new playoff system.
item.description: ESPN’s John Anderson joined “The Kevin Wheeler Show” to talk about the SEC Network, spending time with Mizzou, the Tigers producing defensive lineman and QBs, Maty Mauk, the competition in the SEC, and his take on the new playoff system.

item.title: Brett McMillan’s Redbird Report: Jay’s pinch-hit double looms large
item.itunes:author: 101 ESPN

item.title: Despite a healthy Aaron Rodgers, Mark Chmura says the Packers still have a lot of questions
item.itunes:author: 101 ESPN
item.itunes:summary: Mark Chmura joined “The Kevin Wheeler Show” to preview the Packers-Rams game, the health of Aaron Rodgers, the question marks along the offensive line and defense, as well as what the Pack have at wide receiver. They also looked inside the NFC North and the competition in the NFC.
item.description: Mark Chmura joined “The Kevin Wheeler Show” to preview the Packers-Rams game, the health of Aaron Rodgers, the question marks along the offensive line and defense, as well as what the Pack have at wide receiver. They also looked inside the NFC North and the competition in the NFC.

item.title: Derek Stanley considers “timing” between the WRs and Bradford as most important thing in his return
item.itunes:author: 101 ESPN
item.itunes:summary: Derek Stanley joined Kevin Wheeler in studio to talk about the expectations in Game 2 of the preseason, timing between the WRs and Bradford, what to expect from Bradford, the offensive game planning, and at what point in the preseason do you start making judgements.
item.description: Derek Stanley joined Kevin Wheeler in studio to talk about the expectations in Game 2 of the preseason, timing between the WRs and Bradford, what to expect from Bradford, the offensive game planning, and at what point in the preseason do you start making judgements.

item.title: Bernie Miklasz says “it’s a big boy game” and Matheny needs to realize that with the criticism
item.itunes:author: 101 ESPN
item.itunes:summary: Bernie Miklasz was fired up about Matheny’s lack of ability to handle scrutiny, compares it to the criticism Brian Schottenheimer, Oscar Taveras and all his critics, and Sam Bradford’s debut.
item.description: Bernie Miklasz was fired up about Matheny’s lack of ability to handle scrutiny, compares it to the criticism Brian Schottenheimer, Oscar Taveras and all his critics, and Sam Bradford’s debut.
